extendedInfo.description: The easiest to use scrabble solver on Android. Solve scrabble (and scrabble-like games) for the highest scoring play.This app will take into account the multipliers on the board and the points for each tile to give you the highest possible scoring words. Use it to help you practice, cheat, or just have fun (=Simple graphical user interface that looks like a game so you can see exactly what your options are.Switch to any of 8 game rules on the fly to change the multipliers on the board and the values of the tiles. Works with standard Scrabble, Words with Friends, Wordfeud, Lexulous, Droid Words, WordScraper, Wordsmith, and WordWise.Upgrade to the full version to add blank (wild card) tiles to your rack to find even more word combinations.Upgrade to the full version to save your progress on as many different board configurations as you like so you can come back to them later. This free version allows for up to 2 saved boards at a time.The free version limits the solutions shown to 15, the paid version can show up to 45 solutions.Internet & Network State permissions are only used for Ads, the full version does not have them.Keywords: wordfeud, words with friends, droid words, lexulous, wordscraper, scrabble, cheat, cheater, help, helper, solve, solver, puzzle, unlock, win, dictionary, scrabulizer, crossword, rack, blank, tilesAny questions, comments, requests, or bugs? Please email me, I will do my best to address any issues: tamirh@gmail.com
